title: Including undertow extension disables devmode NotFound Exception Mapper
body:
### Describe the bug

2.8.2.Final

Dev mode includes a handy NotFound exception mapper that shows all the endpoints available
If one includes the `undertow` extension, this seems to disable/prevent this special error page

### Expected behavior

Should show the exception mapper (as it shows without the `undertow` extension)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/887008/167177515-4fa7f9e4-89cc-4541-9044-b8496525a908.png)


### Actual behavior

Displays `Not Found` text

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/887008/167177765-f7b1f240-a8f8-473c-ae5f-978df4c519f4.png)


### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a new project with `quarkus-resteasy-reactive` and `quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson` extensions with sample code
2. Add the `undertow` extension
3. Navigate to a url that should produce a 404

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`
